name: Speed Basketball
description:
1. "Speed Basketball" is an addictive basketball game, once you start, it is difficult to stop!
2. You only need to slide gently with your finger, can enjoy infinite fun of shooting!
3. Here, you can choose to compete with players around the world, through the charts show your strength!
4. Here, you can use a kinds of social networking software to share your achievements and happiness to your relatives and friends!
5. There are four game modes: Time Challenge, Survival Challenge, Counting and Endless. You can choose different modes to experience the different fun!
6. You can accumulate lightning props in the game, which can also be obtained through other methods! The lightning props can be used to unlock a kinds of colorful basketballs.
7. Ready, let our fingers slide up, to show our elegant demeanor under the hoop!
